Write-Up Text: People are talking about the rollback of a controversial Gillard-era parenting policy which will allow single parents to stay at home for four more years instead of being moved to the JobSeeker program. This move by the federal government has been met with mixed feelings as some argue that more changes need to be made to the tax and welfare system. There's been a call for closer monitoring of Australia's taxation policies for oil and gas companies and an article on the issues regarding the #RogueRBA highlights the need for the cycle to be broken.
